targets.expr:
1000 *
sum by (application, method, uri,status) (
  rate(fbb_http_client_requests_seconds_sum{application=~"$application", method=~"$method", uri=~"$uri"}[$__range])
)
/
sum by (application, method, uri,status) (
  rate(fbb_http_client_requests_seconds_count{application=~"$application", method=~"$method", uri=~"$uri"}[$__range])
)

panels.title: Average Response Time Over Time (by Endpoint)

targets.expr:
1000 *
histogram_quantile(
  0.01,
  sum by (le,application, method, uri, status) (
 rate(fbb_fhttp_client_requests_seconds_bucket{application="$application",method=~"$method",uri=~"$uri"}[$__range])
  )
)

panels.title: Summary HTTP Client Requests - Performance by Endpoint
